definition: to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)

pinyin: xin4 dai4 yan3 sheng1 chan3 pin3
jin1 rong2 yan3 sheng1 chan3 pin3

sentences.english: Ketone bodies are short-chain derivatives of fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 酮体是脂肪酸的短链衍生物。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cytotoxicity of chitosan and its water soluble derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究壳聚糖及其水溶性衍生物的细胞毒性。

sentences.english: One cannot imagine mere human beings concocting such dreadful things, and one can scarcely imagine human beings bearing life in them.
sentences.chinese: 更令人想不到的是，居然还有人类在其中繁衍生息。

sentences.english: How many dichloro derivatives of anthracene are possible Give their names.
sentences.chinese: 蒽有多少种二氯衍生物写出他们的名字。

sentences.english: So just keep it in mind that it's flipped.
sentences.chinese: 所以请记住它是衍生出来的。

sentences.english: A novel grease additive derivative of thiadiazole was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一种新型润滑脂添加剂噻二唑衍生物。

sentences.english: No wonder their name derives from the angry Mayan god of storms and wind: Huracán.
sentences.chinese: 难怪它们的名字是从玛雅的风暴和雨神名字衍生而来。

sentences.english: The present invention concerns enantioselective preparation of sulphoxide derivatives or their salts.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及亚砜衍生物或其盐的对映选择性制备。

sentences.english: Foreign exchange security deposit bargain is 42 stir thousand catty develop a financial product.
sentences.chinese: 描述外汇保证金交易是四两拨千斤的衍生金融产品。

sentences.english: When implemented in a derived class, this method cancels a transaction.
sentences.chinese: 在衍生类别中实作时，这个方法会取消异动。

sentences.english: Some copper phthalocyanine derivatives were synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 本文合成了几种铜酞菁的衍生物。

sentences.english: The laser characteristics of a series of substituted PBO are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一系列PBO衍生物的激光特性。

sentences.english: Gunpowder was the lineal successor of the Greek fire.
sentences.chinese: 火药是希腊火的直接衍生物。

sentences.english: The fungal elicitor changed slightly the relative content of each of the shikonin derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 真菌诱导物还影响了紫草色素各衍生物的相对含量。

sentences.english: In the feudal society of absolutism derive the lilliputian of flatter the most easily.
sentences.chinese: 在专制主义的封建社会中，最容易衍生谄谀的小人。

sentences.english: Chitosan is the N- deacetylated derivative of chitin.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖是几丁质的脱乙酰基衍生物。

definition: to produce (from sth else)/to derive (from raw material)/derivative
to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom)/to arise at an opportune time/able to take advantage of an opportunity/to rise to the occasion
to emerge in large numbers/to spring up/to emerge prominently
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
